about_the_game:
Hottie Sweetie is a simulation management game for running a restaurant, using 3D graphics and accompanied by relaxing background music and beautiful maidservants to bring you a better restaurant management experience!

Manage your restaurant

Wait for the customer to come and take a seat to order, operate the machine to make the food the customer needs, and finally hand over the prepared food to the customer to complete the order.

Expand your restaurant

Purchase more tables and chairs, add more food making equipment, enrich restaurant orders, attract more customers, and earn more revenue.

Sweetie Maid

Maid ladies have a variety of clothing options to choose from. As orders are continuously completed, the Hottie will increase, and good things will happen when the Hottie level upgrades.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Hottie Sweetie is a simulation management game for running a restaurant, using 3D graphics and accompanied by relaxing background music and beautiful maidservants to bring you a better restaurant management experience!

Manage your restaurant

Wait for the customer to come and take a seat to order, operate the machine to make the food the customer needs, and finally hand over the prepared food to the customer to complete the order.

Expand your restaurant

Purchase more tables and chairs, add more food making equipment, enrich restaurant orders, attract more customers, and earn more revenue.

Sweetie Maid

Maid ladies have a variety of clothing options to choose from. As orders are continuously completed, the Hottie will increase, and good things will happen when the Hottie level upgrades.
name: Hottie Sweetie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows7 x64
  • Processor: i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10 x64
  • Processor: i5-8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2060 6GB

short_description: Become a mature maid, run the restaurant, buy tables, chairs and machinery to expand the restaurant, and earn more Sweetie (income) in the increasingly Hottie operation!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
